video.title: Aldnoah.Zero
video.synopsis: An assassination plot rekindles a war between Earth and the settlers of a mysterious, high-tech Martian empire in this action-packed anime series.

episodes.synopsis: Eager to see Earth for the first time, Princess Asseylum plans a goodwill visit. But a ceremony marking her arrival takes a startling turn.
episodes.title: Princess of VERS

episodes.synopsis: As Martian forces begin their invasion of Earth, Inaho scrambles to get his friends to safety and discovers something strange is afoot.
episodes.title: Beyond the Horizon

episodes.synopsis: Tasked with distracting the enemy so Earth's forces can regroup, Inaho comes up with a strategy of his own.
episodes.title: The Children's Echelon

episodes.synopsis: As the Martians bombard Earth with meteors, Princess Asseylum asks Inaho for help. Meanwhile, Martian knight Vlad launches a fresh attack.
episodes.title: Point of No Return

episodes.synopsis: When the Emperor of Mars calls a cease-fire, Inaho and his friends take a moment to rest. But soon Vlad returns to Earth looking for a rematch.
episodes.title: Phantom of The Emperor

episodes.synopsis: With the war in full swing again, everyone is drafted into service. A secret military report emerges with new information about Heaven's Fall.
episodes.title: Steel Step Suite

episodes.synopsis: Inaho and the newly arrived Slaine team up against a fierce Martian fighting machine, while the crew explores a mysterious underground facility.
episodes.title: The Boys of Earth

episodes.synopsis: Princess Asseylum finally reveals her secret to the rest of the crew. Back in Cruhteo's grasp, Slaine isn't sure whom to trust.
episodes.title: Then and Now

episodes.synopsis: Slaine discovers Count Saazbaum's true intentions, while Rayet wrestles with haunting memories and dark impulses.
episodes.title: Darkness Visible

episodes.synopsis: The crew scrambles to find Princess Asseylum after the Deucalion crashes. Meanwhile, Count Saazbaum gives Slaine an ultimatum.
episodes.title: Before the War

episodes.synopsis: As Count Saazbaum launches an attack on the United Forces of Earth headquarters, Princess Asseylum comes up with a plan to disarm his Landing Castle.
episodes.title: Wind, Snow and Stars

episodes.synopsis: Inaho takes on Saazbaum so Princess Asseylum can try to reach the Landing Castle's Aldnoah core. Both sides prepare for one final showdown.
episodes.title: Childhood's End

episodes.synopsis: Things are looking desperate for the Terrans, as Mars has taken over most of Earth. Now there's an enemy with super freezing powers to deal with.
episodes.title: This Side of Paradise

episodes.synopsis: Inaho uses his robotic eye to determine that all is not right with Princess Asseylum. Slaine learns of Princess Lemrina's fears.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Count Saazbaum unveils something unexpected after Slaine encounters trouble. Inaho and Slaine encounter each other amid the ongoing war.
episodes.title: Toll for the Brave

episodes.synopsis: Slaine gains status and begins working to keep his actions under wraps. The Terrans are endangered by Kataphrakt. Yuki and Inaho may meet again.
episodes.title: Soldier's Pay

episodes.synopsis: UFE nabs a major bargaining chip when they take Count Mazuurek prisoner. It remains to be seen what will happen after the Deucalion's return to Earth.
episodes.title: The Turning Wheel

episodes.synopsis: After becoming a Count, Slaine has to curry favor with the 37 Clans. With Inaho's help, Earth gives the Knights a run for their money.
episodes.title: The Rose and the Ring

episodes.synopsis: Slaine and Princess Asseylum make an important announcement. With the aid of other Counts, Slaine launches a major attack on Earth.
episodes.title: Here to There

episodes.synopsis: An attack from three Martian Knights has the Earth forces trapped. Fortunately, Inaho and his crew manage to get away, but not unscathed.
episodes.title: The Light of Day

episodes.synopsis: As the Terrans face three Knights' Kataphrakts, they must rely on Inaho to save the day. Asseylum awakes and Lemrina brings her up to date.
episodes.title: The Fortune's Fool

episodes.synopsis: Slaine is unsuccessful at swaying a suspicious Klancain over to his side. An attack is launched against the Moon Base, with Asseylum as the target.
episodes.title: Out of the Past

episodes.synopsis: Klancain rescues Asseylum from danger, and she declines Slaine's request for her to return. Edelrittuo reveals a possible sanctuary for Asseylum.
episodes.title: The Unvanquished

episodes.synopsis: A halt is placed on the hostilities, and uncertainty reigns among the Orbital Knights. The issues between Inaho and Slaine are resolved in battle.
episodes.title: Inherit the Stars
